title: Python制作图形界面
content:
制作网页上传工具

目的

制作这个脚本是为了学习Python的gui图形界面，脚本之前我也已经使用按键精灵制作过，当时是因为手上没有合适的可以快速上手的语言，只好先用按键精灵写一个，使用什么语言和工具都是无关紧要的，只要达到使用目的就行，如今回头希望再使用Python写一个，顺便复习一下。

过程

预览图及exe文件

先放出源码及成品看一下吧


下载链接

#从tkinter导入TK
from tkinter import *

#初始化TK
myWindow = Tk()

#设置标题和大小，一开始大小我用*报错，后来发现要用英文字母x
myWindow.title('关键词上传工具')
width = 600
height = 300

#设置窗口出现位置
screen_width = myWindow.winfo_screenwidth()
screen_height = myWindow.winfo_screenheight()
alignstr = '%dx%d+%d+%d' % (width, height, (screen_width)/3, (screen_height)/4) #因为我的任务栏是在左侧所以会有一点偏差，可以自己调整，计算一下就好
myWindow.geometry(alignstr)

#设置窗口是否可以伸缩大小
myWindow.resizable(width=True, height=True)

#创建关键词文本框
keyWord_1 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_1.grid(row=5, column=1, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_1_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词1')
keyWord_1_label.grid(row=5, column=0, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

keyWord_2 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_2.grid(row=10, column=1, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_2_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词2')
keyWord_2_label.grid(row=10, column=0, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

keyWord_3 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_3.grid(row=15, column=1, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_3_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词3')
keyWord_3_label.grid(row=15, column=0, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

keyWord_4 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_4.grid(row=20, column=1, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_4_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词4')
keyWord_4_label.grid(row=20, column=0, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

keyWord_5 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_5.grid(row=25, column=1, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_5_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词5')
keyWord_5_label.grid(row=25, column=0, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

keyWord_6 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_6.grid(row=5, column=3, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_6_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词6')
keyWord_6_label.grid(row=5, column=2, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

keyWord_7 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_7.grid(row=10, column=3, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_7_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词7')
keyWord_7_label.grid(row=10, column=2, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

keyWord_8 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_8.grid(row=15, column=3, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_8_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词8')
keyWord_8_label.grid(row=15, column=2, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)


keyWord_9 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_9.grid(row=20, column=3, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_9_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词9')
keyWord_9_label.grid(row=20, column=2, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)


keyWord_10 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_10.grid(row=25, column=3, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_10_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词10')
keyWord_10_label.grid(row=25, column=2, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)


keyWord_11 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_11.grid(row=5, column=5, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_11_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词11')
keyWord_11_label.grid(row=5, column=4, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)


keyWord_12 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_12.grid(row=10, column=5, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_12_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词12')
keyWord_12_label.grid(row=10, column=4, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)


keyWord_13 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_13.grid(row=15, column=5, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_13_label = Label(myWindow, text='关键词13')
keyWord_13_label.grid(row=15, column=4, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)


keyWord_14 = Entry(myWindow, width=15)
keyWord_14.grid(row=20, column=5, sticky=W, padx=0, pady=0)
keyWord_14_label = Label(myWindow, text='主体')
keyWord_14_label.grid(row=20, column=4, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

#创建开始按钮
start = Button(myWindow, text='start', relief='ridge', width=8, height= 4)
start.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

stop = Button(myWindow, text='stop', relief='ridge', width=8, height=4)
stop.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky=W, padx=5, pady=5)

#进入消息循环
myWindow.mainloop()

知识点
